sources.title: Latest imported feed items on ArmchairCelts

articles.description:
Photo by Vladimir Pesnya/Epsilon/Getty Images
  

 Not one for saying ‘I predicted it’ (Except I am, constantly) but.....I predicted it. 


I would be very surprised if we signed Jordan Larsson. Seems so unlikely and based on nothing but the idea that it would be ‘pure class’ but if it happens I will never doubt a Scottish tabloid ever again.— Stevie ⚪️ (@stevieblock102) July 8, 2022



Many got a bit carried away with the initial speculation a few days ago, and that’s really all it was until it was confirmed his agent had stated Celtic were seriously interested in the striker, who is available on a free transfer. 
However, Anthony “R” Joseph delivered a knockout blow not so long ago. 


UPDATE: It's looking increasingly unlikely that Celtic will offer a contract to forward Jordan Larsson. His reps made contact with the Hoops - as well as a number of clubs, including Nottingham Forest.Larsson weighing up options with interest from England, Germany & Italy. https://t.co/Pvgpwar191— Anthony Joseph (@AnthonyRJoseph) July 11, 2022



As expected, it’s almost certain Larsson will not follow in his fathers footsteps and become a Celtic legend, and instead try his luck at one of the bigger leagues in Europe, which was always going to be the case for a player of his quality.
So to cheer you up if that’s knocked you for six, here’s Metallica x Celtic to get you going for the season ahead: 



For Whom The Bell Tolls & Celtic ParkTogether at last!  pic.twitter.com/b2o9SjXknd— GIGPOD ⚪️ (@gigpod) July 11, 2022
articles.title: Jordan Larsson to Celtic - not happening

articles.description: Celtic are not looking to sign Jordan Larsson this summer, according to a report. The Swedish Internationalist is out of contract following his contract with Spartak Moscow being terminated by mutual consent. The Scottish Champions had been credited with an interest in the player but this may have been more to do with the emotional Read More
articles.title: Celtic not looking to sign Jordan Larsson, according to report

articles.description: On this day, 11 July 2012, Joe McBride tragically passed away after suffering a stroke. Joe signed for Celtic in 1965, fulfilling a boyhood dream as he left Motherwell for £22,000. He was unlucky to miss out on the European Cup Final in Lisbon due to injury, and for that reason he is sadly not Read More
articles.title: Remembering ‘Goal A Game’ Legend, A Decade After His Passing

articles.description:
We’re all going through tough times at the minute. The most vulnerable in our society are suffering more than most. As a club, we were founded to feed the poorest in our society back in 1888. Celtic is a different beast altogether these days but we’ve never been too far away from our charitable roots. […]

articles.description: Today’s photo of the day shows a meeting of Celtic fans based in England and Wales, at Meca entertainment venue in Swindon. Supporters had gathered from Torquay, South Wales, Bournemouth, Oxford, Leicester, Swindon, Reading, Milton Keynes and even Tyneside – all to attend a live gig headlined by Charlie and the Bhoys, who were ably Read More
articles.title: Photo Of The Day: A Meeting Of Celts In England & Wales

articles.description:
Argentinean midfielder Fausto Vera has reportedly been ‘considered’ by the recruitment team at Celtic. The 22-year-old, who currently plays for Primera Division side Argentinos Juniors, was first suggested as a potential Celtic target on social media yesterday. Argentine-based journalist Roy Nemer reported the rumour, stating his intrigue at seeing the Bhoys linked with a move ...
The post Report: Celtic consider Argentinian under-23 internationalist as midfielder hunt continues appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Report: Celtic consider Argentinian under-23 internationalist as midfielder hunt continues

articles.description:
Celtic has released a ‘never have I ever’ video with full-back duo Anthony Ralston and Greg Taylor. The teammates sat down in Austria to film the video with Celtic TV’s Ryan Maher asking the pair the questions. If they had done what the presenter had asked them, they showed the black side of the table […]
Source
articles.title: Celtic Release Hilarious Video

articles.description: I’m not going to name the Celtic site which, this evening, has taken a story about Celtic not being interested in Jordan Larsson and turned it into one about how we were snubbed by him. I will spare them that embarrassment. But I will say that if you are a Celtic blogger and you are […]
articles.title: Ange Has Spoken, And That’s Why Larsson Jnr Won’t Be Pulling On The Hoops.

articles.description:
The international Celts played their first game of pre-season on Saturday in a thrilling 3-3 draw against Rapid Vienna. After fringe players who had not been representing their countries over the summer won 7-0 mid-week, those who had a slightly mixed-up summer took to the field. There were certainly some promising signs on Saturday contrasted […]

articles.title: ‘I’m not going to lie’ – Matt O’Riley Pre-Season Admission

articles.description: I am a proud European, no matter what queue I have to stand in at the airport. I voted Remain. I will vote Yes in the future independence referendum in the hope that we are returned to the EU. I have loved the EU since I visited Germany for a trade union conference when I […]
articles.title: Brexit Has Changed Celtic’s Transfer Focus … And Very Much For The Better.

articles.description:
Mickey Johnston has been at Celtic since 2008, rising through the ranks to the first team. He’s failed to consistently impress fans, with injuries constantly sidelining the winger. He’s shown glimpses of being a good player, he’s got pace and doesn’t mind doing a few tricks here and there. Being a winger is one of […]
Source
articles.title: Last Chance Saloon for Celtic Star

articles.description:
Celtic are reportedly not looking at Swedish striker Jordan Larsson as an option during this summer’s transfer window. The 25-year-old was recently released by Russian side Spartak Moscow and is currently on the lookout for a new club. Of course, the news of Larsson being available on a free transfer brought a lot of fanfare ...
The post Report: Celtic 'not looking' to sign Jordan Larsson as transfer stance is revealed appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
articles.title: Report: Celtic 'not looking' to sign Jordan Larsson as transfer stance is revealed

articles.description:
Celtic had received contact from Jordan Larsson’s agents. However, despite his interest in the club, the player has made a u-turn deciding he would not wish to join the Scottish champions. Celtic could’ve picked up the player for free after he terminated his contract in Russia, but after news of his potential signing went quiet, […]
Source
articles.title: Jordan Larsson to Celtic Not Happening – Report

articles.description:
Celtic has been linked to Argentine midfielder Fausto Vera just weeks after signing Alexandro Bernabei, the first Argentinian to pull on the hoops. After Celtic missed out on signing Vinicius Souza, the club started exploring the market for other options. Football Scotland has provided fans with an update on the player. The report states that […]
Source
articles.title: Fausto Vera Recruitment Talks; Celtic’s Interest

articles.description:
The first few weeks of the transfer window have been an extremely exciting time for the Celtic support. Ange Postecoglou got to work early, bringing four new permanent additions to his squad ahead of the 2021/22 campaign. Both Cameron Carter-Vickers and Jota made their returns after an excellent loan spell, whilst Ben Siegrist and Alexandro ...
The post The patient stance that Celtic supporters will need to take at this stage of the transfer window appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.
